datasets.title: Central-Asia-exposure-dataset---Projected-residential-exposure
datasets.description: Regional layer of residential buildings in Central Asia, projected to 2080
datasets.purpose: Developed as part of the regional risk assessment, under the Strengthening Financial Resilience and Accelerating Risk Reduction in Central Asia program. (https://www.gfdrr.org/en/program/SFRARR-Central-Asia)
datasets.project: Strengthening Financial Resilience and Accelerating Risk Reduction in Central Asia

gazetteerEntries.description: Central Asia: KAZ, KGZ, TJK, TKM, UZB

referenced_by.name: Central Asia exposure data development technical report - English version
Central Asia exposure data development technical report - Russian version

resources.title: Central Asia projected (2080) residential exposure - all countries, Oblast level: SSP1
resources.description:
Central Asia projected (2080) residential exposure - for all five Central Asia countries included in the analysis, one file per Oblast (ADM1) for SSP1
Dataset includes projected residneital data for SSP1, SSP4, SSP5 scenarios.
Files: RESIDENTIAL_[OBLAST]._2080_[SSP].csv
